product_meta.title: OGX Extra Strength Damage Remedy + Coconut Miracle Oil Conditioner, 13 Ounce
product_meta.description: After a deep cleanse with OGX Coconut Miracle Oil Shampoo, make sure to lock in moisture and hydrate hair with this creamy, extra-strength conditioner enriched with coconut oil, vanilla extract, and essence of tiare. Island vibes await with classic coconut oil, vanilla bean extract, and tiare for a light tropical blend of smells blended in a paraben and sulfate-free formula that's great for damaged, curly, frizzy, and coarse hair. Helps tame frizz and leave hair silky soft, improving elasticity. Apply to wet hair and wait 3 to 5 minutes before rinsing. Use a wide tooth comb to detangle to achieve quality haircare results.
feature_bullets: SOFT, TOUCHABLE, HEALTHY: An exotic & enticing ultra-rich blend w/ coconut oil & vanilla extract, this formula helps create hydrated hair that is soft, touchable, & healthier looking with each use; for damaged, curly, frizzy, & coarse hair types

BOUNCE AND SHINE: Treat your senses to an organics-inspired island escape with an ultra-rich repairing blend with coconut oil. This nourishing formula calms frizz and tames flyaways, leaving hair with a silky soft bounce and shine; improves elasticity

BEAUTY PURE AND SIMPLE: OGX hair care products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, straighter, curlier, or bouncier & smell irresistible while we’re at it.

ROCK WHAT YOU'VE GOT: OGX hair care products are designed to bring out the best in your hair, no matter what type or texture. Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for colored hair, blowout cream, or matte pomade--we've got you.
REAL QUALITY, REAL BEAUTY: Unattainable looks don't inspire us but originality does. OGX hair & skin care product collections are here to help you look your best! We’re beauty, pure & simple.
